turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a charge on my account. I was billed $75 this month, but my plan is supposed to be $50. I'm a bit frustrated because this has happened before.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration, and I apologize for the error. Could you please provide me with your account number or the phone number associated with your account so I can look into this for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 555-123-4567. While you're looking, can you explain *why* this keeps happening? Is there some kind of glitch in the system? I need assurance this won't be a recurring problem.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I see the overcharge. It appears there was a temporary promotional discount that expired, but it wasn't correctly removed from your billing profile. As for *why* this keeps happening, uh... the system is complicated. I have applied a credit for $25 to your account to cover the overcharge, and I've also submitted a request to ensure the correct billing amount is applied going forward. It should be resolved within 24-48 hours. Will there be anything else?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I see the credit now. Thanks for fixing it. Hopefully, this is the end of it. I appreciate your help.
